description:
A technical tool designed for steep mixed lines and modern alpine routes. The G-Bone aluminum shaft has an ergonomic shape that can be gripped along the length of the shaft. Shaped for steep ice and mixed use, the shaft has a radical curve, is stable for hooking, and has a well-balanced swing weight.

  • Aluminum shaft is radically bent to clear bulges and ice mushrooms
  • Rubber and plastic grip reduces vibration
  • Head has no hammer or adze
  • Includes Ice Vario pick, aggressively curved and tapered for penetration in thin ice
  • Compatible with Ice Vario, Total Ice Vario, Total Dry Vario, Katana Ice Vario and Dry Plus picks (sold separately)
name: Grivel Tech Machine Ice Tool
